title: Delay of morning offering
vignette: Oversleeping priests begin the daily service late.

options.text: Proceed quickly even if after sunrise.
Cancel and wait until the next day.

title: Insufficient wood on the altar
vignette: A shortage of firewood threatens the constant flame.

options.text: Use leftover festival decorations as fuel.
Do not improvise; wait for proper wood.

title: Non-priest helping with slaughter
vignette: A lay Israelite volunteers to assist with the Tamid offering.

options.text: Allow limited help under supervision.
Only priests may perform any part.

title: Using blemished animal by mistake
vignette: During the rush a blemished lamb is selected for the daily sacrifice.

options.text: Replace it immediately with an unblemished one.
Proceed to avoid delays.

title: Extra singing during service
vignette: Levitical choir wishes to add additional psalms beyond the usual.

options.text: Allow creative expression to inspire worshippers.
Stick to the prescribed liturgy only.

title: Cleaning ashes on festival
vignette: The altar is overflowing with ashes during a holiday.

options.text: Remove them despite festival work limits.
Wait until after the festival ends.

title: Forgotten utensil overnight
vignette: A priest leaves a sacred knife outside the Temple courtyard overnight.

options.text: Rinse it and use it; no harm done.
The utensil must be re-sanctified before use.

title: Argument among priests over tasks
vignette: Two priests quarrel about who performs which part of the service.

options.text: Decide by lottery to keep peace.
Let seniority determine the roles.

title: Insufficient incense prepared
vignette: Only half the usual portion of incense is mixed for the day.

options.text: Use what is available rather than none.
Delay until the full measure can be prepared.

title: Changing the order of service
vignette: A new overseer proposes rearranging the steps for efficiency.

options.text: Follow the traditional sequence strictly.
Adopt the more efficient order.

title: Opening gates early
vignette: Pilgrims arrive before dawn demanding entry to watch the service.

options.text: Open early to accommodate them.
Keep standard hours for order.

title: Minor blemish on priest's garment
vignette: A tear is noticed in a priest's robe right before the sacrifice.

options.text: Ignore and proceed to avoid delay.
Replace or mend it first.

title: Incense spilled on the floor
vignette: During preparation a scoop of incense powder falls to the ground.

options.text: Gather and use it if clean.
Discard it out of respect.

title: Priest fainting mid-service
vignette: A young priest collapses from heat while carrying out the offering.

options.text: Pause to provide care and replace him.
Continue without interruption.

title: Untrained priest assigned duties
vignette: A new recruit is asked to perform part of the service without prior training.

options.text: Allow under supervision to learn.
Only trained priests may serve.
